text: Piper is a 2016 computer-animated short movie produced by Pixar Animation Studios. It was written and directed by Alan Barillaro, it was theatrically released alongside Pixar's Finding Dory on June 17, 2016. It won the Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film at the 89th Academy Awards, becoming the first Pixar animated short to win the award since For the Birds in 2002. The short movie is about a hungry baby sandpiper learning to overcome her fear of water. ==References== Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:2016 computer-animated movies Category:Pixar short movies
title: Piper (movie)
